statements: SELECT user_name, playlist_name FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT user_name FROM users;
SELECT user_name, playlist_name, jsonb_array_length(playlist_songs) AS num_songs FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, playlist_name FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT playlist_name, jsonb_array_length(playlist_songs) AS song_count FROM users ORDER BY song_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, playlist_name FROM users WHERE playlist_songs @> '[{"title": "Song 1"}]';
SELECT user_id, user_name, playlist_name FROM users WHERE playlist_songs @> '[{"artist": "Artist X"}]' AND LENGTH(playlist_name) > 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM users;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, display_name FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, playlist_description FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id = 3;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, duration FROM songs ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, display_name FROM users WHERE voice_command_enabled = true ORDER BY display_name ASC;
SELECT playlist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS song_count FROM playlists JOIN songs ON playlists.playlist_id = songs.playlist_id GROUP BY playlist_name HAVING song_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND duration > 180 ORDER BY duration DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.playlist_name, s.song_title FROM users u JOIN playlists p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN songs s ON p.playlist_id = s.playlist_id WHERE u.voice_command_enabled = true ORDER BY u.username, p.playlist_name ASC, s.song_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM playlists WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT song_title, artist, genre FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT playlist_id, song_id, added_at FROM playlist_songs ORDER BY added_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM playlists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist, genre FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND artist = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT p.playlist_name, s.song_title FROM playlist_songs ps JOIN playlists p ON ps.playlist_id = p.playlist_id JOIN songs s ON ps.song_id = s.song_id;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, description FROM Playlists WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT title, artist FROM Songs WHERE duration > 180;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM VoiceCommands ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_name, description FROM Playlists ORDER BY playlist_id DESC;
SELECT title, artist, duration FROM Songs WHERE duration > 180 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM VoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
